remarks: Every infinite set has an equinumerous proper subset, proved without AC or Infinity.  Exercise 7 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 91.  See also ~ infpssALT .  (Contributed by NM, 23-Oct-2004.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 30-Apr-2015.)
statement:
infpss $p |- ( _om ~<_ A -> E. x ( x C. A /\ x ~~ A ) ) $.
$d A x $.
